nodes.title: II.2. Superficial structures: Primarily funerary superstructure
Funerary Structure FS2
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS2 (2.6 m x 2.4 m) is a single-course enclosure, whose larger upright stones reach 70 cm in length and project as much as 40 cm above the ground surface (57.724΄ / 52.923΄ / 4880 m).

nodes.title: Funerary Structure FS3
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS3 (1.8 m x 1.8 m) is a single-course enclosure made up of upright rocks, up to 75 cm in length, which project upwards of 30 cm above the ground surface (57.631 / 53.026 / 4880 m). Stones of the perimeter walls have broken free and lie scattered inside the small enclosure.
